item.title: Print Design for The Louden Singletree
item.description:
Design & Layout Manager, Sep 2023 - Apr 2024

Each year, a student-run board from the University of the Fraser Valley publishes a new edition of The Louden Singletree, a literary journal of student, alumni, and faculty art. In addition to supporting the board as co-Project Manager (formerly Webmaster), I was responsible for the design and layout of all finalized literary and visual art submissions in InDesign, to prepare files for professional printing with a local print company.
